mapper.select: SELECT P .*, M .url picUrl FROM project_info P, media_info M WHERE P .gid = M .project_id AND M . TYPE = '图标'
SELECT P .*, M .url picUrl FROM project_info P, media_info M WHERE P . NAME LIKE '%${projectName}%' AND P .gid = M .project_id AND M . TYPE = '图标'
SELECT * FROM media_info A, ( SELECT caption_id, question_id FROM project_info WHERE gid = #{projectId} ) b WHERE A .gid = b.caption_id OR A .gid = b.question_id
SELECT P .*, M .url picUrl FROM project_info P, media_info M WHERE P . gid = #{proId} AND P .gid = M .project_id AND M . TYPE = '图标'

SELECT A .*, P .develop, P . NAME project_name, b.url FROM (SELECT * FROM app_face) A, media_info b, project_info P WHERE A .project_id = b.project_id AND b. TYPE = '图标' AND b.project_id = P .gid ORDER BY A . INDEX
mapper.insert: insert into project_info ( name,disnum,description, develop,keyword,price, address,commission,header, tel,back_time,state, remark,type,report_limit, bidding_begin,bidding_end ) values ( #{project.name},#{project.disnum},#{project.description}, #{project.develop},#{project.keyword},#{project.price}, #{project.address},#{project.commission},#{project.header}, #{project.tel},#{project.backTime},#{project.state}, #{project.remark},#{project.type},#{project.reportLimit}, #{project.biddingBegin},#{project.biddingEnd} )
